description.bodyEN: Let's go to the most popular nerd convention in the world!!!
Take some drugs (for their recommended use, with the recommended dosage).
GET THE FUCK AWAY FROM ME!
dont make me do this, p-chan...
I'm ██████, but you can call me ███!
Browse the message boards to reveal the truth once and for all
Skip tonight, and tomorrow, and the next day, and the next, and...

ending.name: The Angel Dream
ending.osimai: Spending all your time in dreamland isn't always the best idea.
ending.jisseki: When the sun came up, I couldn't tell where Heaven stopped and Earth began.

ending.name: FOLLOWERS
ending.osimai: Even a needy girl needs her space.
ending.jisseki: What is a follower really? A fan, or something more? Or perhaps something less?

ending.name: An Angel's Love
ending.osimai: A floating feeling, grounded in reality.
ending.jisseki: Before you can love another, you first must learn to love yourself.

tweet.bodyEN: I did something super special today 🎉 I can't say much yet, but I promise you guys are gonna hear all about it soon! 🤫
omg that was so scary, did i really think nobody would notice kangel at THE nerd convention? bet they don't know it was the real kangel tho 😆
Sorry guys, your internet angels' feeling a little rough so I'm gonna take a break for tonight! I should be back to 100% by tomorrow though, so don't miss the next stream! 🙂
Suddenly felt like going on a nighttime walk, so I did. It was really really cold, and a lot quieter than I remember nighttime being??? Something doesn't feel right... 😨
i'm not on stream, why do i still feel like i'm being watched? maybe skipping the stream was a mistake
probs doesnt help that i accidentally wore kangel outside haha
I think it's disgusting when people violate others' boundaries just because they think they can. If you wouldn't like something done to you, don't do it to others, okay?
this can't be happening LEAVE ME ALONE YOU FREAKS
i must be imagining things...
i think im losing it, there's no way that people would follow me like this
every single time i go outside i fear for my life
the outside world is a lie, ur being observed offline just as much as online
Took the time to catch some fresh air today! Seems pretty lively out there, what are you guys up to today? ☀️
thank god for p-chan, it's soooo obvious they're following me even when i'm not walking outside in kangel's clothes by accident lmfao
that being said, im really really scared right now, im not sure the outside world is safe anymore
Ahhhh, there's nothing like the great outdoors, right guys? Not that you guys see a lot of that! Remember to go touch some grass once in a while!
WHY THE HELL ARE PEOPLE FOLLOWING ME LIKE THIS!? GET THE FUCK AWAY FROM ME ALREADY!!!!
i can't take this anymore. why would i ever go outside again when i have the internet and u, p-chan?
Get your butts over here, guys! I'm doing a surprise early stream, gonna be streaming until I drop! ✨ Aha, hopefully it doesn't come to that though
someone come and end my suffering already, i cant take this anymore
Hey guys! Sorry about what happened earlier, I've been struggling with really bad nightmares lately and I think I might've had one on-stream?
I'll explain what happened a bit more later, so be patient with me for now!
On the bright side, you got to watch the internet angel sleep live! You should all count yourselves lucky~
why the hell did i stream for that long anyway? not like i got that much more out of it
...WAIT ARE THEY GONE?????
I almost locked myself out of my account today because I mistyped it SO many times. How do you guys get it right every time???
its just one bad thing after another at this point
KAngel is dead. You killed her. There's only Ame now.
ur all gonna get what u asked for
I'm doing my last ever stream tomorrow. Be there.
im not gonna bother acting all cutesy for you anymore, it was vile acting for you freaks
im starting stream now btw, come see your "angel", come see what you did to her
omg i proposed to p-chan and they said yes!!!!!! im so happy! here's to our married life ♥️
Something's got me really really pumped up today! You guys aren't gonna be ready for me tonight!

me and p-chan had an "i love you" contest bc i said there was no way they love me as much as i love them.
still not sure who won that, but god that was the best sex ever
Remember: no matter what, I'll always love you.

kuso.bodyEN: omg what is it kangel?????
Please take a break, I'm running out of money for SuperChats...
CANT WAIT
ooh oooh ooh i bet she went out somewhere cool!
more than u thats for sure
Yeah whatever, not like you'd know.
I like grass! Show me yours?
no way
I KNEW IT YOU LYING WHORE
my hearttttt, why would you do this to us???
What did you expect guys? Of course she's already taken.
You should introduce us to them sometime!
p-chan? that's a cute nickname!!! can i call you k-chan?
Yeah you have us
early stream???? lets go!!!!!!!!
We're watching, KAngel! Do your best.
Just make sure to take care of yourself! We can't lose our angel now!!!
thank god, i was gonna kms but ur notification came at just the right time. ur a real angel
Drop for us~
Are you okay? A lot happened...
Uggghh school's gonna suck today, didn't get any sleep because of you
you should still go to the hospital
go back to sleep, but don't wake up this time
Everyone already knows what happened, you're the talk of the internet right now.
How about you be a patient instead?
interneto interneto interneto OVERDOSE
sleepy angel kawaiiii
god that was some good material, do that again sometime
🙏BLESS🙏
damn, she forgot to turn off the stream...
had my best night's sleep in years thanks to ur stream, i love u kangel
Ikr???? Passwords are pain
It's not that hard to remember :P
omg we almost lost u??? sad
OUR ANGEL RETURNS!!!!!!!
istg if you quit im gonna kms
NOOOOOO MY ANGELLL
welp, there it is. sooner than expected too
Best of luck with your future endeavors, KAngel!
fucking whore quits at the first bit of drama in her career, the state of metube these days
omg i checked ur priv and... ur such a bitch????
I spent SuperChats on you...
thats a threat, calling the police!
Oh wow, I looked through your posts and... honestly, I think I love you more than KAngel
Omg you're such a horrible person, can't believe the things you've been saying behind our backs.
wow, being cute really is your only redeeming quality
kill yourself
Don't worry guys, she'll be back the next day! She's just milking the drama, like every other MeTuber who's running out of content.
dont u dare quit on us kangle
but i loved you kangel...
ayo what u mean by that kangel 😳
Good for you! Can't wait for tonight's stream.
why is my life such a mess...
I love you! Please go out with me?
We were born ready, KAngel! Let's do this!
omg really needed to hear that, thanks kangel
I LOVE YOUUUU
don't listen to her guys, she probably just got off with her boyfriend or whatever
kangel gang rise up!
KAngel, you're the best!!!

moddata.jines:
p-chan!!! comiket is over now
don't forget, we gotta tell the nerds all about it tonight!
hey p-chan...
i had a dream
i was a butterfly
the most brilliant blue butterfly you've ever seen
even though on the inside... im far from it
a morpho butterfly riding the wind, taking me wherever the earth wants me
and then i woke up
but... how do i know?
how do i know im not dreaming now?
i could be a butterfly dreaming about ame
or an angel dreaming about being ame
or ame dreaming about an angel
p-chan
this might be a bit sudden but
will you stay with me?
I will.
thank you
you're the only one who can understand me like this
i'll see you on the other side, okay?
goodnight p-chan
mwah ❤
ngl that was really fun
seeing all the nerds in their natural habitat was really eye-opening
no way im not talking about this as soon as comiket ends
but ill let the nerds have their fun first
going outside is so scary now
i swear they're following me
every step of the way
i don't wanna go outside again
i don't feel safe out there
even the message boards are better
please just let me stay inside, p-chan
p-chan... i can't do this
i feel them watching
always watching
just out of sight
waiting
i have so many followers
thousands of people
following my every move
walking the same path as me
kill me
eyes
so many eyes
im being watched
every face full of hate
they try and hide it behind pretty smiles
i see them for what they are
p-chan... i can't do this
i'm not going out again
i'll do anything but that
i feel the weight of the world on me
let me take some pills to calm down, at least
pleasepleasepleaseplease
p-chan
i'll do ANYTHING
just don't force me to go out there ever again
i can't take it anymore
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
P-CHAN
THE FOOTSTEPS ARE DEAFENING
VOICES SHRIEKING
GAZES PIERCING
I FEEL THEM
EVERYONE
WATCHING, OBSERVING, JUDGING
I WANT TO END IT
ILL DO ANYTHING TO END IT
hey look at this dm >
a composer said they wanted to write a song for me! >
ive come so far... but...
theres no way i can go to the studio
they're all watching me....
it's tough being so... popular
i cant believe theyd go to this level haha
stalking?! what the fuck is wrong with people???
but... im scared
its only a matter of time before something happens
can u stay with me when i go out, p-chan?
i dont think i can go out alone anymore
Of course.
thank u
i know ill be safe by ur side
im counting on u, p-chan!!!
IM SO STUPID
WHY DID I POST THAT TO KANGEL?!
...
its too late now
theyre never gonna forget this
im scared
and if theyd go this far for me
now that they know about u too, how much farther can they go?
i dont want to find out
alright
nobody should bother us now
as long as we dont go outside we'll be fine, right?
its not like theyd break in, haha
well, maybe
but i dont think theyd go that far
i hope they dont go that far
i think i know what to do
if they were caught on camera their life would be ruined
in that case...
theres nothing to do but stream my heart out until they go away
ughhh this is gonna be a long stream
Do you need anything before the stream, Ame?
no, i should be fine
wait, p-chan?!
...
maybe im imagining things
im gonna go get ready
uuuuughhh this is exhaustinggg
ive been streaming for ages
and this dumb outfit is soaked
the stress is killing me
i wish i could end stream, but what'd happen if i did? id probably get attacked
the stream is the only thing keeping them from just waltzing in
they found our house, right?
Yeah, I think so.
of course they did p-chan
what was i even thinking, telling everyone i was at comiket back then?
there was no fucking way they weren't gonna try and find where i went
and that dumb night walk practically screamed "KANGEL LIVES HERE"
im such an IDIOT
Everyone makes mistakes.
NOT LIKE THIS
I guess you're right.
its been too long now
i better get back on stream
...i love u, p-chan
I love you too, Ame~
We'll be together forever!
AME
Ame... please.
Open the door.
p-chan help
i had a relly bd nightmare
i was streamng and fell asleep
and when i wok eup door ringing
p-chan they're gong to come in...
i cant do this without u
I’m here for you.
thanks p-chan
i dont know what id do without u
probs die or smth
Ohhh, you will when you realize!
realize wut
p-chan...?
no
im dreaming
pls tell me im still asleep
I'm sorry.
HOW LONG HAVE I BEEN STREAMING FOR???????
A while.
P-CHAN
U COULDNT HAVE WOKEN ME UP?????
...
ahaha
now everyone knows kangel as a drug addict
and a fake
and... soz
they know about u too...
There's no use crying over spilt milk.
p-chan...
i cant believe thats all u have to say
id die if someone outed me like i did to u
i guess that means im dead too
we're in heaven
Or hell.
or hell, yeah
i gotta come up with a cover story
how do i explain this...?
i think i know
p-chan can u go out and check for me
are those freaks gone?
I think so.
u think so? whats that supposed to mean
ur so silly, p-chan
thanks for being here for me
i could never do this without u
I think you could.
no way
like i said earlier
id die
but thanks for believing in me anyway
that being said
can i have today off?
Yeah. You need it.
i love u p-chan
ur so considerate of me
what would i ever do without u?
ugghhhh I overslept a bit
couldnt i just wake up just a little earlier?
oh
metube logged me out lmao
u think it wouldnt be that hard to stay logged in
can u log me in again? the password is still "{}"
p-chan please
at least watch what ur typing
try again, ok?
p-chan
u dont have caps on or smth do u?
lemme try then
it doesnt work
why doesnt it work
i never changed it
even though we changed it
HOW?!
WHY THE FUCK DOES THIS KEEP HAPPENING TO ME??????
Ame.
P-CHAN????
I can be your p-chan.
but u already are... wait
not u too
P-CHAN!!!!!
Save me.
alright, i changed ur password, u should be good now
I'm back, Ame.
I THOUGHT I LOST U
NEVER DO THAT TO ME AGAIN P-CHAN
I won't.
promise me
PROMISE ME
I promise you, Ame. I'll never leave your side again.
never?
Never ever ever ever.
i love u p-chan
I love you too.
kangel
what am i going to do about kangel?
You should try the password again.
but we already tried it three times
i guess it wont hurt to try one more time
huh
i guess i was just mistyping the password
but how?
anyways
i guess it works now
okay, almost time for the next stream
u think i should try to explain whats been happening?
Are you sure?
people love irl drama
dont u remember those breakdowns i had?
i had so many viewers compared to usual
even though it was killing me
if im going through something
they love it
they love when im suffering
yeah, ive made my mind up
theyll remember this alright
im gonna take some pills to give me a little boost for this
god knows ill need it
Ame, please!
We'll do anything!
But give us KAngel back!!!!
I don't care anymore.
Go away.
p-chan not found.
i love u p-chan
But you? You're not them.
its been a long month, huh?
well, i can't say its been bad
in fact...
you've made me really really happy, p-chan
i love you
i love love love love you!
its been tough being kangel and all, but...
with you by my side, i think i can do anything
you really are the love of my life
And you're the love of my life too.
aww, really p-chan?
you're so sweet
i trained you well
i couldn't ask for a better p-chan
i know you feel the same way
and you've already met my parents, so...
p-chan
will you marry me?
I will.
OH MY GOD
i love love love love love you!!!!!!
i think im the happiest girl in the world
there's no way that anyone else is as happy as me rn
i love you
i love love love love love love love you!
i love you!
don't worry, i'm not going out with anyone else
we were made for each other!
uuugh it's so hard to pretend to love them as much as they think i do
id much rather spend that energy elsewhere
i love you
i love you
i love love love love you
p-chan i can't get enough of you...
i love you so much
I love you more.
no way! there's no way you feel more for me than i do for you!
i love love love looooove you!
And I love love love love love looooooove you too.
oh yeah? you wanna show me how much you love me?
show me, p-chan ♥️
omg, that was amazing...
i didn't even know i could go for that long, but... wow
you're the best, p-chan
It was great for me too.
that makes me happy to hear!
but don't forget, just because you're all mine doesn't mean we're gonna do that all the time!
not that i'd mind doing it all the time tho
and don't forget! we're getting married!
you really are marriage material... i love love love you, p-chan
I love love love you too.
hey p-chan~
so i looked up the rules regarding marriage and stuff
turns out they won't accept our marriage
apparently it "isn't legitimate" or whatever
tbh i thought i'd feel worse hearing that, but
i don't think i care!
it doesn't matter if the world doesn't recognize us
those stupid adults don't know what they're talking about anyway
i love you
i love you
i love you!
I love you too.
omg p-chan!
i love you sooooo much!
you love me too, right?
Of course I love you.
and i don't wanna say that to anyone else!
so i've decided!
i'm quitting being a streamer!
i wanna spend all day telling you how much i love you!
i love you
I love you too.
i love you!
I love you too!
I love love love you!!!!
I love love love you too.
hey p-chan
i love you
i love you so much
we'll be together forever
i love you
I love you too.
i love love love you
I love love love love you.
i love love love love love you
I love love love love love love you.
i love love love love love love love you
I love love love love love love love love you.
p-chan!
i'm really horny today!
Me too.
mm, that was great
i love you
mwah ♥️
i love you
I love you too.
really? how much?
I love you thiiiiiiiiiiis much.
aww, that's cute
but i love you even more!
...i can't keep going, p-chan
i love you, but...
it all feels the same now
i can only say i love you in so many ways
there's only so many positions we can try
i can't take this anymore
it's so... samey
i need more, p-chan
I'm sorry.
don't be sorry
but
i think...
maybe we weren't meant to be after all
and im sorry
It's okay.
i'll always love you, but...
i think it's time we say goodbye
I'll always love you.
thank you p-chan
i love you...
and goodbye
I'm really proud of you, Ame.
You've come so far since when I first met you.
aha, thanks...
i'm glad you pushed me to talk about that
it got me a bit too emotional though...
It's okay.
It'll take time.
But Ame?
yeah?
You got this.
what
this cant be right???
i swear it was "angelkawaii2"
now that i think about it
thats a kinda shitty password
okay p-chan, try logging in again first
alright
now time to change the password
ive always sucked at making passwords, so...
p-chan, i can trust you with this, right?
that's better
surely theres no way they can hack "{}", right?
surely no way, its impossible
nobody could hack you p-chan, you're so smart
hey p-chan
what would you do if we got a million yen
and an immortal snail chased us?
but nobody seems to ask
what would an immortal snail do with a million yen?
snails cant use money
p-chan i don't feel too good...
i think im gonna throw up
bleeeeghh
uuuugh that felt horrible
i almost forgot that taste
i think
im gonna take a break for today...
PICK A GOD AND PRAY!
omg i just saw the most amazing food on my feed
kinda hungry now ngl
feed me, p-chaaaaan
im starviiiing
apparently something big happened on the news
who actually watches the news lol
the real drama happens on tweeter
hearing people say "i can fix her" is really funny somehow
you really think you can fix me?
i'd like to see you try

speak.bodyEN: Hey cuties! It's KAngel, your cute internet angel!
I got up to something interesting lately that I thought might be fun for you guys!
I went to Comiket! Yep, you heard that right!
It was really nice meeting some of you guys in person.
You all seemed really excited, but I guess that IS your natural habitat!
Though we may have caused a little too much mischief for an event like that.
Maybe it would've been one thing if I'd signed up as a participant, but... oopsies!
Sorry for the inconvenience, Comiket! I didn't mean to cause any trouble, I promise!
Although I guess all the KAngel cosplayers were getting just as much attention too.
I guess I'm really just that popular now.
Maybe next year I'll have a convention of my own?
But until then, you guys will have to make do with my streams!
I'll see you guys next time!
Really really amazing! They put so much work into making it happen, so make sure to thank the organizers!
Please don't-uhh, I mean shhhhh, keep that to yourself!
And you can be! I believe in you! And the rest of you guys too!
OMG, thanks! But I can't do it without you guys, so watch all my streams and send tons of Super Chats, okay?
I'll see what I can do! No promises though, it'd be a lot of work and... haha, only time will tell, right?

msg.bodyEN: OMG SO I DID SEE YOU!
ur so nice, i wish i could be like u
I didn't know I was hoping for this until you said it, but now I can't go back.

speak.bodyEN: H-hey cuties~! It's KAngel, the cutest angel on the internet!
I didn't have anything special planned for today, I just really wanted to stream for you guys!!!!
How's everyone doing today?
I'm doing great today too! And it's great to see you guys are all doing amazing!
Oooh, how'd you guys feel about doing an AMA today?!
Aha, I guess that answers that! Let's do it!!!!
Mmmm, is that really the kind of question you ask a cute girl like me? Let alone an angel?
I spend most of my time preparing my next stream for you cuties!
I'm an angel, so... God! I can't say I've ever met Him, though! Maybe one day!
Every d-wait, what kind of question is this?!
Ah, I've been really busy lately, so I've been having more quick stuff than usual...
It's not healthy, but it's so easy. What's an angel to do?
A few! Plus all of the nerds here, which is a LOT of friends!
Aha, you guys are all an angel would ever need.
And here we have the viewer who thinks he dresses better than an angel!
There's no way your outfit makes you look cuter than mine does~
If you send pleeeenty of Super Chats and let me guys know what you'd buy, I'll do my best!!!
P-They're not stupid, they're adorable! Don't be mean to the poor kitty!
And I thought the internet loved cats.
A looooooot! Being a streamer is amazing, I get to talk to you guys AND get paid at the same time!
You can do anything! But don't blame me when your channel dies 'cuz everyone's watching me instead.
You guys are funny! We don't have nearly enough followers to make that happen yet!
But maybe if you spread the word about me we'll be able to make something happen!!
To think that so many people out there are out there thinking about my body... yuck!
Well, you know what they say about the internet!
More than anything else, being ignored. Without you guys, I'd die!!!!
So make sure to give me loooots of attention~
Easy! I hope you slip in some mud when you go outside next!
Mmmm, I'm glad you like it. It really *does* make me look cuter, doesn't it~?
We angels have our ways of getting things.
Nuh uh, I just reaaaaaally wanted to stream for you guys when I woke up! I'm perfectly fine, I promise!
You mean this?
As often as you guys say weird stuff, which is a LOT!
I see someone isn't following me on Tweeter! Fake fan!
Neither! Have you SEEN all the pretty colors during autumn?
The pleas of the internet led to the birth of me, the internet angel.
As long as you keep believing in me, I'll have all the energy in the world to entertain you guys!
Aw, you must really be going through it if you're asking here!
But does that really count as a question?
Of course I do. What streamer doesn't like their fans?
I don't know if I have a favorite. I love anime, but games are fun, and it's fun trying out new things...
There's so many things to do, especially in this heaven we call the internet. I can't possibly pick just one!
Aha, funny joke. This person really thinks they know my address.
You probably don't even know your own, so go buy a map and maybe you'll see which way the circus is.
People on the internet loooove to hide behind their mask of anonymity, so a lot of them become jerks!
I love p-all of you. As long as you're watching my streams, you're all in my heart ♥️
Well, I'm everyone's cute internet angel! Isn't it obvious?
Aha, I'm beat... Some of those questions were tough!
You guys could use some work with your questions! What sort of person even ASKS those kinds of things????
Anyway, what's next...
Alrighty, I think that's enough questions for now! You guys had some good ones!
I'd really like to continue, but we've been doing this for aaaages, so it's time we change things up!
Angel will now commence...
Hmm, these questions aren't very inspiring...
I don't think I'm gonna answer any more questions!
How about instead we do some...
Gaming!
Games are really great!
And I happened to pick up a new one!
It's an old horror game about a space station that came out ten or so years ago?
It's really highly regarded for how old it is, so you guys are in for a treat!
Maybe if you're lucky, your angel might even scream!
Hah, dream on! I LOVE horror. You won't get a peep from me.
Ooooh, the title screen is really nice! It feels lonely somehow. Like the station has been abandoned?
And very broken, aha! I bet those two won't be coming back anytime soon.
Hiiiii~! It's another person! Fix the place already, it's all broken!
Aw, there's people chasing us now. Quick, ruuuuuun!!!!
Phew... we escaped! That was a close one!
E-eek! Did he just get dragged into that hole???? I don't wanna be stuck in a hole! Lemme ouuuuut!!!!
Pleasepleasepleeeease why does the train take so loooong? Hurry up already IM BEING FOLLOWED!!!!!
Whew, we made it... haha! That was really fun!
N-no! Of course I wasn't scared. I was just acting for you guys, of course! Believe me!!!
But I'm gonna take a short break! I'll be back in a minute.
Sorry for taking so long, guys! I hope you haven't been getting too bored waiting!
...Hold on, I forgot something!
I'm still kinda recovering from the other day, so...
There we go, that's better! Remember to take your meds when you're sick, guys!
It's really important to take care of yourself.
I sometimes get a little anxious for no real reason, so...
Ahah, I might have forgotten to take some earlier, so I'm doing that now!
After all... It's been a loooong stream, hasn't it?
I wonder how much longer we can go on for...
...zzzzzz...
...AAAAAH!!!!
Nonononono LEAVE ME ALONE!!!!
WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS?!?!?
WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU GET FROM DOING THIS TO ME????
GET THE FUCK AWAY FROM ME!!!!!
I... I can't... p-chan... I need p-chan...
p-chan...
What... what's going on...?
H-huh?!
I-I... AAAAAAH!
NonononoNONONONO!

msg.bodyEN: was about to kms but saw u streaming
What do you do when you're not streaming for us?
ur our angel, but who do *u* idolize?
What's up with the stream title?
how many friends do u have?
whats with the absurd looking outfit?
how do you feel about that stupid cat?
How much money do you make from streaming?
Can I be a streamer too?
What do you think about the more lewd activities of your fanbase?
what do you fear the most?
What do you have to say to all the KAngel haters?
howd u make ur outfit, its so cute
You're streaming really early today, did something happen?
how many times do u do it a day?
what kinds of things do you wear offstream?
im going through it, could i get a bless from you?
whats ur fav thing to do when no strm?
can u unlock ur door when i get there???
why r people saying weird shit?

speak.bodyEN: It's me, your internet angel.
I'd like to tell a story today.
A story about an angel and her followers.
There's been... certain things happening to me.
But you guys know that already, don't you?
You followed me home from Comiket.
You followed me around at night when I was taking a walk.
...You followed me around when I was with my p-chan.
P-chan... you even followed them too.
In fact... p-chan's been acting weirdly lately.
That was because of you, right?
...ahahahaha!
Did you guys change my password? I bet you did.
Are you so obsessed with me that you want to BE me? Or are you just getting off on messing with me?
Or maybe both?
You should consider my feelings. No, *her* feelings.
You know p-chan, and you even know my FREAKING PASSWORD. Surely you know her too?
Or maybe you don't know a thing about your darling “internet angel”.
Aha, I bet you guys aren't even interested in her, are you? You love KAngel. Not me.
It's time for you guys to be a little more considerate.
Apologize to her.
Apologize to me.
Apologize to Ame.
It'll never be enough...
No amount of apologies will ever make up for what you guys have done, or what you could've done.
I'm lucky to be alive right now, really.
But KAngel? It's too late for her now.
She fell a long time ago.
Go to hell.

msg.bodyEN: haha so u decided to go public

wtf are you on about kangel
we should've taken the time to get to know u better
ame? that ur real name? weird but ok
So Ame is your real name.
are you sure you should be telling us this?????

Why is she acting so weird?

speak.bodyEN: It's me, Ame.
You might know me by my OTHER name.
OMGkawaiiAngel. What a waste of my life.
Nothing but suffering.
Nothing but hurt.
And all of you guys? You're sick in the head.
How would YOU like it if the world obsessed over you like that?
Could you take it? Being stalked, harassed, doxxed, and everything else you sick fucks can think of?
KAngel couldn't.
KAngel didn't want to be followed like that.
All KAngel wanted was to be a shining ray of hope for you in this bleak world.
And what did you do?
You made her life a living hell.
She tried to make the most of it.
But no matter what she did, the world was always against her.
You showed her it wasn't worth saving.
So here she is.
This is what you wanted.
This is what you asked for.
KAngel is dead.
And it's all your fault.
You've made your choice.
And I'm making mine.
The internet angel descends upon the internet, ready to spread... love!
Aha, I guess I did put that in the stream title, so you guys already know that.
Now you guys might be wondering: what is love?
Love is... kinda hard to explain, now that I think about it!
It's kinda like... the feeling of being understood. Someone who'll never leave your side no matter what.
And you can feel love for anyone or anything!
Even if they're not real!
And it's totally okay to love anyone you want, no matter if they can't be there for you in the flesh.
And if they can't accept it? They're not worth your time!
Of course, I'd like it best if you loved me the most! I need those SuperChats, after all~
But even if it's not me, I can understand how you feel. I'm here with you!
And of course, I love all of you! You're all an angel could ever need.
Anyways, it seems like it's that time again!
I'll see you guys next time!

speak.bodyEN: Your internet angel shines brightly, illuminating even the darkest corners of cyberspace.
I wanted to talk about something a little bit serious today.
It's something that I'm sure you guys deal with too.
Back when I first descended to the internet... I was really struggling emotionally.
And to help myself cope with that I had you guys, and...
You guys might hate me for this, but I had a lover too.
I-it's not what you think, I promise!
It... wasn't real.
It's really hard to explain, but...
Don't let yourselves get carried away, okay?
I know it's easy to give in to your fantasies, but...
It's important to remember what's real.
No matter how tough it gets... the real world never goes away.
And while a fantasy can feel nice for a while...
It's never going to be a real substitute for reality.
Not only that, but... it can be really detrimental for you too.
Remember when I vanished for a while back when my career was starting up?
Yeah. Don't let yourselves fall as far as I did, okay?
I know I can't force you, but... please promise me.
Don't forget to give me plenty of attention too!
But... take care of yourselves.
Nobody should go through what I did...
Aha... this has gotten me a little emotional now...
I think I'm gonna head out for now, this got a little too intense for me.
Sorry, guys. I'll be back next stream!
Bye bye for now!

We believe in you! And we promise not to fall that far!
I hope you feel better soon KAngel!

And so the angel dreamed forever and ever A floating feeling, light as a feather Unbound at last from binding ties Free at last to explore the skies But over time, the angel grew weaker The clearest skies grew ever bleaker And at last, those brilliant blue wings Gave way to truth, pulling the strings As one dream ends, a voice calls out
Rest for eternity
